overview:
Lou Casale is a seasoned marketing and communications executive who has managed global programs for FORTUNE 500 corporations and startups.

Lou currently oversees corporate affairs at NCR, a $5.4 billion global technology company that enables more than 300 million transactions between businesses and consumers every day.

A recognized expert in corporate communications, Lou has provided counsel to numerous high profile companies, including Coca-Cola, EDS, eHarmony, and Sony. In 2010, he was named a finalist for Communications Executive of the Year.
